column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Annette - Thank you kindly for the 5-star review! We greatly appreciate it. I'm also happy to know both of our JINYA locations are consistent with our fare. There is really no other way for us to know this without this type of feedback from our patrons. And I'm also very pleased to know your kids enjoy our ramen
column2: too! We look forward to the privilege of serving you and your little ones again soon.
